item.title: Collection of brand and ID work
item.author: hello@aentan.com (AenTan)
item.description: 6degrees Tailored to its essence, a geometrical fit cut for 6degrees – a self-cleaning and self-updating digital phonebook. Initially available on Android and now on iOS, 6degrees is a self-updating phonebook that automatically cleans duplicates and backs itself up. One of the first things I did for 6degrees was to refresh their identity. The old logo although full of homemade goodness was too much like a geek hobby project. 6degrees is named after the popular theory originally set out by Frigyes Karinthy and popularized by a play written by John Guare â€“ that everyone and everything is six or fewer steps away, by way of introduction, from any other person in the world.
